FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Namespace FlowGraph.Core.Input

Classes

BehaviorBase

Base class for behaviors with default no-op implementations.

BehaviorResult

Result of a behavior's input handling.

GraphHitTestResult

Result of a graph-wide hit test, identifying what element (if any) was hit and providing typed access to the target.

HitTestResult<TElement>

Result of a hit test operation against a specific element type.

PortHitInfo

Information about a hit port.

ResizeHandleHitInfo

Information about a hit resize handle on a node.

ShapeResizeHandleHitInfo

Information about a hit resize handle on a shape.

Interfaces

IBehavior

A behavior that can observe and optionally intercept graph input events.

IGraphHitTester

Hit tester for the entire graph surface. Aggregates hit tests across all element types with proper priority ordering.

Hit Test Priority Order (first match wins):

  1. Resize handles (highest priority - always on top)
  2. Ports (small targets need priority)
  3. Nodes (front to back by Z-order)
  4. Edges (may need tolerance-based hit testing)
  5. Groups (behind their contents)
  6. Canvas (empty space, lowest priority)

Inspired by:

  • react-diagrams: DiagramEngine.getModelAtPosition() with type filtering
  • Konva.js: Stage.getIntersection() returning topmost shape
  • draw.io/mxGraph: mxGraph.getCellAt() with priority handling
IGraphInputEvent

Framework-agnostic representation of a graph input event. Wraps hit test results and modifier state without exposing UI framework types.

IHitTestable<TElement>

Interface for components that support hit testing.

Contract: Implementations MUST document and enforce the coordinate space specified by HitTestCoordinateSpace. Callers MUST provide positions in the declared coordinate space.

Inspired by:

  • Konva.js: Stage.getIntersection(pos) returning the topmost Shape
  • react-diagrams: DiagramEngine.getModelAtPosition()
  • WPF/Avalonia: VisualTreeHelper.HitTest() pattern

Enums

HitTargetType

The type of element hit during a graph hit test.

InputModifiers

Keyboard modifier flags (framework-agnostic).

MouseButton

Mouse button identifiers.

ResizeHandlePosition

Positions of resize handles on a node or shape.
